txt.en: 'I think Master Húrin's uglier than an Orc.'
'You can't shoo us off. Húndil the tavernkeep said we could stay!'
'Have you got something for me to deliver? I don't usually take deliveries from foreigners.'
'Somehow, it seems I'm always getting into some scrape or other.'
'The little ones  are scared of the Secret Walker. Me? I'm scared of the Warden of the Burgs.'
'Well, I consider it good fortune we were left behind. We may be useful where it matters most!'
'It is good of you to play with Midion, brother. He is the only one smaller than you.'
'Oh, Landath. What trouble have you got into now?'
'You don't dare go after dark. The guards will find you - and if they don't the Secret Walker will!'
'How strange the City seems, with only guards and soldiers left!'
'Have you heard? Bergil has a halfling friend!'
'Little Bereneth's father is a soldier. He must be very brave!'
'I saw Prince Imrahil come through the Gates. How young he looked - and yet how stern.'
'How my stomach growls. Is it long until supper time?'
